meanings.definition: A substance that attracts and holds other substances on its surface.
meanings.sent1: The adsorbent in the water filter traps impurities to make the water clean.
meanings.sent2: The adsorbent material in the air purifier helps remove allergens from the air.
meanings.sent3: The adsorbent sponge soaked up all the spilled juice in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an adsorbent, absorbing every detail of the story.
meanings.sent5: The adsorbent paper towel quickly soaked up the spilled milk.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to adsorb other substances.
meanings.sent1: The adsorbent material is great for removing odors from the fridge.
meanings.sent2: The adsorbent properties of the clay make it ideal for purifying water.
meanings.sent3: She had an adsorbent memory, never forgetting a face she saw.
meanings.sent4: His words were like an adsorbent sponge, absorbing all the attention in the room.
meanings.sent5: The adsorbent fabric of the towel quickly dried the wet dishes.
